Changing Promotion Groups

You can change a promotion group if you accidentally assigned the wrong promotion group to a revision, or if you want to reassign a promotion group to a different promotion group within the same promotion level. We do not recommend using the Change option as a means of promoting revisions because it does not enforce the promotion model hierarchy assigned to your project database.

You can change promotion groups by selecting a revision, a single versioned file, multiple versioned files, a project, a folder, or a project database.

Using the System Default Options

Unless your Administrator changed the defaults for the project's configuration, when you change a promotion group assigned to a versioned file, Version Manager:

  • Uses the first development group for both the Change From and To fields.
  • Does not change the promotion group assigned to files in subprojects.

To change a promotion group:

  1. Select the item that contains the promotion group you want to change.

  2. Select Actions | Promotion Group | Change. The Change Promotion Group dialog box appears.

  3. Accept the defaults listed above and click OK, or do the following:

    1. To override the defaults on the General tab, edit any of the fields described below:

      To... Do this...
      Select the promotion group currently assigned to the items Select the promotion group you would like to change from the Change From list box.
      Choose a new promotion group to assign to the items Select the new promotion group from the To list box.
      Assign the new promotion group to all revisions in subprojects Select the Include files in subprojects check box. This field is available only if the item you selected for promotion group change is a project or project database.


    2. To review the selected files:

      To... Do this...
      View which items will change promotion groups Click the Selected Files tab.
      View the properties of the items selected for promotion group change Select the item and click the Properties button.


  4. Click OK. The promotion group is changed on the selected project or files.
